sentences.en: An alarm links the police station to the divisional headquarters.
sentences.cn: 在部门总部和警察局之间连有警报器。

sentences.en: By the end, bodies were strewn all round the headquarters building.
sentences.cn: 最终，总部大楼四周遍布着死尸。
都柏林总部已经同意了

sentences.en: Headquarters was swamped by an avalanche of applications for battle assignments.
sentences.cn: 请战书像雪片似地飞向指挥部.

sentences.en: Its headquarters will soon be relocated from Westminster to the Greenwich site.
sentences.cn: 其总部很快将从威斯敏斯特迁往格林尼治。

sentences.en: Several great guns from the headquarters are coming to see us today.
sentences.cn: 总部的几个大人物今天要来看我们.

sentences.en: She knew the exact location of The Eagle's headquarters.
sentences.cn: 她知道“飞鹰”总部的确切地点。

sentences.en: The bank has its headquarters in Paris.
sentences.cn: 这家银行的总行在巴黎.

sentences.en: The headquarters had been infiltrated by enemy spies.
The headquarters is some 30 miles due west.
sentences.cn: 总部位于正西大约30英里处。

sentences.en: the headquarters of the United Nations
The latest photographs were sent anonymously to the magazine's Paris headquarters.
sentences.cn: 最新的照片以匿名方式寄到了该杂志的巴黎总部。

sentences.en: The letter instructed him to report to headquarters immediately.
sentences.cn: 那封信指示他立即向总部汇报。

sentences.en: The union's headquarters is in Transport House.
sentences.cn: 工会总部在运输大楼内.

sentences.en: This message caused perturbation in the Middle East Headquarters.
sentences.cn: 这则消息在中东总部引起了不安。

sentences.en: We fixed for the team to visit our headquarters.
sentences.cn: 我们安排了该工作组参观我们的总部。

sentences.en: We lost no time in returning to the headquarters.

trans.tran_cn: （机构，企业等的）总部，总店，司令部，指挥部
trans.tran_en: the main building or offices used by a large company or organization
